  • Method Details

    • editMap

      public String editMap(String p_fileName)
      This method is to edit map. If the specified map file does not exist, it will create a new map file. If the map file exists, it will load the map file and set the edit phase to true.
      Parameters:
      p_fileName - Name of file
      Returns:
      String which states completion of the operation

    • loadMap

      public String loadMap(String p_fileName)
      This method is used to load a map.
      Parameters:
      p_fileName - Name of the file
      Returns:
      loaded map(responses true or false)

    • loadMap

      public String loadMap(String p_fileName, boolean p_isEdit)
      Load map method to load a map
      Parameters:
      p_fileName - Name of file
      p_isEdit - true if loadmap is called in edit phase
      Returns:
      loaded map(responses true or false)

      Returns:
